attributes.action: we want to turn right into warrington road from st pauls ave
attributes.additional_details:
you have stopped us turning right onto warrington road. we now have to travel all the way around the estate to get to little lane. I believe that the change that was made stopping traffic turning right was directly responsibil for the deaths of Terry Charlton and Les .they were killed by a speeding driver.
the government also says cut down your emissions to save the environment you are making every house holder do the opposite

rejection.details: This would be a matter for the local authority.
